thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan wants to be the Saina Nehwal of films!
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan wants to be the Saina Nehwal of films! - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Shah Rukh Khan wants to be the Saina Nehwal of films!
text:
Bollywood 'Badshah' Shah Rukh Khan has responded to Saina Nehwal's wish that she wants to be the "Shah Rukh Khan of badminton", by saying that he wants to be the "Saina Nehwal of films".
  A photo posted by Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) onSep 17, 2015 at 11:24am PDT
 
The "Dilwale" star expressed this desire on his Twitter handle on Sunday night and posted: "I want to be the @NSaina of films!!"
The duo last month met in Hyderabad on the set of the actor's film "Dilwale", and even gave a shot at badminton with their little 'tuk tuk' moment. Saina, who clinched a silver medal at the Badminton World Championships last month, described it as an amazing experience.
